title: How do you find your chat logs?
body:
I've looked and search around for about 2 hours and I can't figure it out.

How are people finding their chat logs?

replies.body: Chat logs are only available in reform cards due to a behavioral occurrence.  Otherwise, you can retrieve your chat logs at our[ privacy page](https://privacy.riotgames.com/en_US/) for a small processing fee.
